mapper.insert: INSERT INTO expense.income_attribute( id, description, price, payment_date ) VALUES ( #{expense.expenseIdentifier.value}, #{expense.description.value}, #{expense.price.value}, #{expense.paymentDate.value} )
mapper.select: SELECT expense.id, expense.description, expense.price, expense.payment_date, attribute.id AS attribute_id, attribute.category, attribute.name AS attribute_name FROM expense.expense LEFT JOIN fixed_expense ON expense.id = fixed_expense.expense_id LEFT JOIN variable_expense ON expense.id = variable_expense.expense_id LEFT JOIN attribute ON attribute.id = fixed_expense.attribute_id OR attribute.id = variable_expense.attribute_id WHERE expense.id = #{expenseIdentifier.value}
